attributes.additional_details: British Government start urgently working with World Leaders, the WHO (World Health Organisation), UN (United Nations) and other important and vital world Organisations, to insure that epidemics Like the COVID-19, SARS, West Nile Virus, Bird Flue, Swine Flue, Ebola, Zika Virus etc… Never recur again, or at least fully minimise this from recurring, by making new global measures and laws, and for any Nations who violate this to become full accountable.
attributes.background: British Government start urgently working with World Leaders, the WHO (World Health Organisation), UN (United Nations) and other important and vital world Organisations, to insure that epidemics Like the COVID-19, never recur again.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
